name: Ahvaan Trust
briefDescription: Ahvaan, in collaboration with Ambedkar University Delhi, is working with the Directorate of Education, Delhi Government, in the areas of teacher education, curriculum development and in an advisory capacity in pre-primary and primary school education. Ahvaan has developed the SCERT Delhi's Nursery and Kindergarten curriculums, being implemented in all Government schools across Delhi. The team supports  pre-primary teachers of 50 schools, in a high-touch model, to transact these curriculums effectively. Ahvaan also works deeply to help teachers develop values in children. The organisation's efforts are supported by corporate donors like the Japanese Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation, Chennai-based Turbo Energy and Sundaram BNP Paribas Home Finance, HDFC's HT Parekh Foundation and the public sector ONGC. Ahvaan also collaborates with reputed organisations in the development sector - like Dasra, Muktangan and the Singapore International Foundation. For more on Ahvaan, log on to www.ahvaan.org or its Facebook page www.facebook.com/ahvaantrust.
